author: jim
msg: Final touch tonight... avoid the possibility
that var_type isn't defined. To work around possible buggy compilers, we
create an enum type and then the var and then assign it

author: jim
msg: Some fine-tuning... use enums rather than 3

author: jim
msg: Really handle the short 'h' flag now

author: jim
msg: The final phases of the great 'quad' update.
ap_snprintf() can now handle quads, assuming the compiler knows
about them, and we now determine which type is the off_t

author: jim
msg: Add the needed logic in ap_snprint to handle
quads (long longs). Note that we depend on AP_LONGEST_LONG being
set correctly. This change does not effect the current operation
of ap_snprintf, so it's OK to add right now while we work on
